tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Vendor (
    vendor_id UUID NOT NULL,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (vendor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ingredient (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  vendor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendor(id)
);

CREATE TABLE menu (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  ingredient_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredient(id)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    vendor_id INT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT NOT NULL,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    order_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vendors (vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
vendor_name VARCHAR(50),
contact_person VARCHAR(50),
phone_number VARCHAR(15),
email_address VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE ingredients (ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
ingredient_name VARCHAR(50),
vendor_id INT,
quantity DECIMAL,
unit_of_measure VARCHAR(20),
FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id));

CREATE TABLE recipes (recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
recipe_name VARCHAR(50),
ingredient_id INT,
quantity DECIMAL,
FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredients(ingredient_id));

CREATE TABLE menu_items (menu_item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
menu_item_name VARCHAR(50),
recipe_id INT,
price DECIMAL,
FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipes(recipe_id));

CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
order_date DATE,
menu_item_id INT,
quantity INT,
FOREIGN KEY (menu_item_id) REFERENCES menu_items(menu_item_id));
